import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get part supplier by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/{PartSupplierId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single part supplier record by its unique identifier so you can review supplier metadata before assigning it to parts.

**Prerequisites**
1. **PartSupplierId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers](/docs/api/parts/list-part-suppliers) and extract `Items[].PartSupplierId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List suppliers and select the supplier to inspect.
2. [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/\{PartSupplierId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-part-supplier-by-id) to load full details.

**Minimal Required Fields**: PartSupplierId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"PartSupplierId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the part supplier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

coordinate"},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true,"description":"Geographic longitude coordinate"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the address has been
